snippet: A natural gas leak was confirmed as the cause of a blast that leveled buildings in Greenwood, a neighborhood in the north-central part of the city.
lead_paragraph: A natural gas leak was confirmed as the cause of a blast that leveled buildings in Greenwood, a neighborhood in the north-central part of the city.

headline.main: Seattle Gas Explosion Levels 2 Buildings and Injures 9 Firefighters
